content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my deck around midnight having a smoke and looking at the stars when i saw a dark triangle shape aircraft with 5 orange red lights , thought it might be a delta wing aircraft but it did not make a sound and seemed to moving to slow, went inside my house and went online to find a description of aircraft with the five orange red lights that i just had witnessed,  could not find any.
content.summary: Sitting on my deck having a smoke, checking out the stars

content.detailedDescription: Era sobre las 21:00 de la noche delante de la fachada del gran templo del tesoro de petra. un bola brillante de forma esférica mucho mayor que cualquier estrella fue visible cruzando el cielo.
content.summary: Bola brillante que parecia efectuar un pequeño zizzac muy sutil

content.detailedDescription: Sunday, 3 august 2014, 10:40 pm, i was leaving burger king in north haven and i noticed two objects floating in the sky. i got out my car and watched as these two crafts sped back and forth, ascended and descended, two red lights in front and three green light in back but every now and the the green lights turned yellow, i grabbed my iphone and started to video, a woman came up tome and asked "what are those things?" i said "i dont know but i got 'em!" i didnt look to see who she was, i was elated! i got video of these things, and as i was thinking this i noticed the video was not "touched" on; i know i touched the red button on the phone but it didnt start. i touch the button and the video begins; i am so angry because i had incredible footage... the footage i have is still worth looking at. i called the north haven police to see if anyone reported seeing light in the sky but the officer said "only you."
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Video recorded w/ smart phone, it's incredible; phone does not pickup the colors

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were watching television, and conversing. i brought up the idea of watching the clouds, we looked out our window for 5-10 minutes. i noticed a couple mysterious objects in the sky, when my father was making himself a pot of coffee. i called him in to look, but he no longer remembers the encounter. the very second i saw the objects, i thought ''they're ufos!''. both objects were stationary, but disappeared after some time. after the sighting, i developed feelings of anxiety, and i felt scared, i remember having a headache, but i also think i had a breathing problem shortly after, i felt fine during, and before the sighting. i lost sight when they flew away.
content.summary: Two hovering objects, one looked like a football & it spun & had yellow lights, inside i thought i saw humanoid creature. i also saw a white, triangular shape, that also hovered in place, i did not see any occupants. both flew away after 2-3 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girl friend had went for a ride down the street and parked next to the school so we could get out the apartment the kids had company and not as soon as we got there i see what look like ball's being launching from the north of us we thought they were fire works at first but then they just kept coming one after another i would say over 50 and they all went in the same direction south then east, i would say after the 15th one i call the police and the police brush me off and said the don't track the sky and there phone is for emergencies only i said ok and hung up the cell phone. so then we tried to get video of it but the phone's had bad quality and couldn't take video so we try and take pictures but the were to far away it wasn't tell i found a video on youtube from my town of the same thing we seen and they were able to catch it on video so that's why i writing you guys this. i have seen these more then once in my life and i think i even caught a gray in a photo from 96 when i was younger i am 41 now so i will send the pic as well. i just would like to know if i have had a close encounter because this has been happening since i was a kid thank you. here is video link   http://youtu.Be/fadbxqqyu70
content.summary: They were like glowing balls there was over 30 and they just came one after another i made a report to local police the brush me off.

content.detailedDescription: Arrived home around 12:45am. spotted in the sky coming over the garage a single bright tear drop shaped object heading wnw to ese. i immediately dismissed at first as being the iss or other satellite until my boyfriend took a closer look at it and said he didn't think it was a satellite. at first to me, it was not flashing or blinking at all. we both got out of the car and observed the bright star like object that didn't make any noise. we watched it and the entire object seemed to be pulsating a white light as well as being solid white. no noise. no other lights. no apparent structure. i know what helicopters and airplanes look like and even drones. to the best of my knowledge this was not a drone. again this was one single bright white object. the entire light pulsated a white light all around it. it was completely silent. we watched it fly off to east south east.
content.summary: Single silent bright white star like object pulsating. thought was iss but was not

content.detailedDescription: We were 4 guys outside at night looking at the heavens when we see this star looking thing that was really bright and moveing extreamly fast. as it went it faded into the darkness. right before it made a wierd turn.
content.summary: Looked something like a star that faded into the sky at extream speeds. turned wierd.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking near the chop shops in flushing, queens after a mets game when i heard a distinct buzzing noise. i looked up over the shops to see the outline of a saucer flying above me. it was hard to see at first because it was sooooooooo bright in the daylight (probably some alien camouflage technology) but as soon as it stopped moving i was able to make it out. it was indeed a flying saucer with a distinct dome on the top with windows where figures were peering out. i strategically placed myself inside a dumpster close to the object (i would say within 400 feet) and began to take notes on my handy dandy note pad! after i positioned myself, a beam shot down and 2 figures appeared in its place. they were scaled with antennas. the looked around for about 30 seconds when a subsequent beam shot back down to transport them to the ship. the ship then began to power up and flew away straight over laguardia airport and back into space. i took a rough sketch on my handy dandy note pad (that i would be happy to share). i can be reached day or night. if you need any help or a personal tour of where it happened please contact me asap. unfortunately my cell phone was broken (and still is) so i don't have pics but i can be reached by email 24/7.
content.summary: Aliens in flushing!!!

content.detailedDescription: Me and my fiance were outside smoking a cigarette around 10:40 pm. we noticed off the bat a big glowing, white, starlike object coming from the southwest. it didnt have any light pattern resembling a plane. it just pulsated. so it caught our attention. we watched this object, ruling out planes, helicopter, chinese lantern ect... it was phenomenal. kind of moved in a zig zag pattern then returned to going straight. it pulsated and had  absolutely no sound. it had the same elevation as a plane but moved pretty slow. then, it did the most bizarre thing ever!! it stopped, and then dissapeared in thin air! as if the light simply turned off. ive seen this once before in the same area.
content.summary: White star like object no distinct plane light pattern.

content.detailedDescription: This object on the picture looks like the sun, but the sun is the brightest object. also looks like a "second sun". it was moving "erradically" from side to side appearing and dissapearing, but no shape change. this happened in maunabo, puerto rico. this object was leaving a trail of high, supersonic speed leaving a trail in front of it, like breaking a barrier...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looking at the sun afternoon. object moving (weird). took picture then dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was color white like a star ant it moved and disapeared first time i see this there were 5 ufos
content.summary: In ponce saw up too 5 stars that moved in different directions they glowed an more people saw them

content.detailedDescription:
In 2012 me and my partner were at london walking down oxford street , i was taking photos of famous landmarks using my iphone 4s. for a split second i took a picture of the bt mast situated just off of oxford street . later that day i went through the photos taken that day i notice this shape near the  bt mast . at the time i took the photo i recall
no sound and i did not see it with my naked eye the photo was the first i saw of it .
content.summary: London 2012 mid day, photo of bt mast later saw ufo in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting lasted about 5 minutes. 
in the beginning there were four lights, but after a minute, two of them have suddenly disappeared.
the lights were moving in direction north/south (from gargano to the tavoliere delle puglie).
to the naked eyes they were much bigger and looked like red balls of fire.
content.summary: The sighting lasted about 5 minutes.  in the beginning there were four lights, but after a minute, two of them have suddenly disappeared. the lights were moving in direction north/south . to the naked eyes they were bigger and looked like balls of fire.

content.detailedDescription: Last night 8-5-14 about 3am i went out on my back porch to smoke and a flash in the sky to the west caught my eye at first i thought it was a meteor but it wasn't. it didn't move at all it flashed or blinked maybe 7 or 8 more times then got very very dim for maybe 30 to 45 seconds then it started flashing again but it wasn't regular it would flash two or three times fast then maybe flash slowly a few times then speed up then randomly get very dim and a few times it just went out completely where i could not see it at all then it ether flash against or just get brighter slowly where i could see it again when it was dim it looked round but when it flashed it looked more diamond or octagon shaped there was no sound at all that i could. hear and i really could not tell how far away it was but it was bigger than the stars but not much this went on for about 20 minutes until it went dark and then didn't light back up as i watched it there almost seemed to be a pattern to what it was doing but i could be wrong but it sure seemed like it i have no idea what it was i've never seen anything like it and i'm out there in the same place 3 or 4 times a night and i'm a avid meteor shower watcher and i've never saw anything odd before i would think if it was man made it would have moved just a little bit but it didn't it didn't move a inch the whole time i watched it and now that i think back on it i don't understand why i just sat there and watched it without getting excited or freaking out or anything it kind of makes me feel uncomfortable that i acted that way because it sort of freaks me out now looking back on it all i can say is it's the strangest thing that's ever happened to me
content.summary: Went out on my back porch to smoke a cigarette and a flash of light caught my eye i thought it was a meteor at first but it kept flashing in the same spot.

content.detailedDescription: I was running by a park and noticed what i thought was a star at first, but it was moving, so i stopped and started to look at it. it was a little bigger than a star and moving towards me, then changed direction to my left, i was trying to decide what it could be, i was confused and excited, i look over to my left to see if this guy was watching it too, i walked over to him and asked "you see this?" he said"yeah. i see it." we watched it as it went behind the clouds, i asked him "that was weird right?" he said "yeah, i guess so."
content.summary: Saw a star like object moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were camping right outside yosemite national forest in california star gazing at around 9:30-10:00 pm around our fire pit. the isolation and elevation makes the stars stand out and the big dipper look 10 times larger than usual, so the sky was perfect for gazing. we noticed some shooting stars and some planes. i noticed a star-like object that looked to be at the height that a passenger jet might fly, usually so far up that it looks to be going super slow. but this object was spanning across the sky at a very fast pace in regards to my guessed height and per my vision. i pointed it out to my girlfriend jokingly as a ufo, because we actually enjoy alien/ufo stories. i personally have always found it really interesting, especially of late, but never thought i'd ever actually see one. half way across the sky the object met a similar one, a little dimmer. they came together spun around each other quickly. the second one then passed the other slightly and stayed put in place, the other continued the direction it was going but looked a little dimmer until it disappeared from sight. the hovering one remained until i just couldn't look anymore and lost track of it after a few blinks and gazes into my fire pit. the stories of other ufo encounters seem pretty similar to what my girlfriend and i saw. also i am familiar that yosemite has a history of strange events. i was excited and a little freaked out because i have always had a total fear of the "grey" aliens, just the way they look has always got to me since watching close encounters as a kid. anyways, i am glad that i was able to see some and it really topped off our mini vacation. also we both had no service up there so we did not have our phones to take pictures on us immediately, it was so far up i don't know if it would of captured it well anyways.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like object traveled across sky and mee/interacted with other starlike object.

content.detailedDescription:
One 4th of july approximately 1992, we were observing fireworks from our back deck. the house is on a lagoon off barnegat bay. as my husband and i watched, we saw three distinct gray discs in a triangular formation. they were kind of translucent but could be clearly seen. they hovered, and seemed to be three separate objects, and not the "feet" or "pads" of a single triangle-shaped craft. off in the distance, a star-like object was moving up and down, seemingly very far away. the three discs seemed much closer. both the star-iike object and the three gray discs remained in place for several hours. it was almost as if they were watching the fireworks display. all of a sudden, the star-like object dipped below the horizon, then shot up at an amazing speed, too off and disappeared as it took off. the three discs remained for a while, then seemed to disappear. i did not notice them leaving, but all of a sudden they were gone. lots of people had to have seen them, and as a matter of fact, several months later we saw a report on the 6 o'clock news (one of the nyc stations) that showed a videotape of exactly what we had seen. it must have been visible all up the nj coast, because someone in another beach town had taped it and sent it in to the news. 
i am certain about the july 4th date, but i am uncertain of the year. it had to be during my daughter's high school years - 1990-1993. i believe it was 1992. 
i have had several sightings over the years- the first when i was about 15. i was about 38-40 years old when i had this sighting. i am never afraid. i am always exhilarated when i have a sighting. it's almost like i am excited to see them back again. 

somewhere, a videotape of this must still exit.
content.summary: 3 discs hovered in triangular formation, 1 star-like hovering

content.detailedDescription: Was at home watching the iss flyover , then all of a sudden we seen another object approach the iss and seemed to get close to it,  this object was dim at first then when it got in front of the iss it became bright for about 2 seconds then went dim again.  after this it left the iss and went in a easterly direction. definitely something i never seen before..
content.summary: Saw this object when watching the iss flyover

content.detailedDescription: I was with a friend as we were walking back to a rental cottage in ocean grove, nj  around midnight on a saturday night. it was the summer of 1964. on a perfectly clear cloudless night, we stopped to gaze at the millions of stars visible near the beach at night. suddenly our attention went to a single "star" that was moving straight up. then, it suddenly changed direction and moved straight down. it repeated this a few times. we knew it wasn't a plane because panes don't move like that, and as it was a small as a star, too far away to be a plane anyway. suddenly a vapor trail began to come out of it- we stood as if glued in place. my friend thought it might be a skywriting plane, but i knew it wasn't because it wasn't writing anything, skywriters don't write at night, and it was too far away to be a small plane. eventually the vapor trail began to descend. forming a large cloud-like shape. this "cloud" was easily as big as a house- oddly, although we could see the dark night sky through it, we could not see any stars- and we should have been able to see the stars. the rest of the night sky was filled with them. it was as if inside the cloud the stars became invisible. as it got larger, we realized it was getting closer and at that point we heard a strange noise that i can only describe as sounding like hundreds of wheels and gears turning at the same time. the sound jolted us out of our lethargy and we began to run towards home. as we ran, we looked over our shoulders to see the "cloud" following us at about the level of the treetops. there were no cars on the street- at that time, ocean grove did not allow cars in or on its streets from midnight saturday to midnight sunday. they actually had village gates that were locked, and no cars were allowed to be parked on the streets either. no lights seemed to be on in any houses, and at that time ocean grove had no shops or stores that would be open at night. no gas stations. no 7-11 or wawa. there wasn't a soul around. we heard the noise as the cloud followed us- we were laughing and crying at the same time. we were only about 2 blocks from the house we were staying at, so we reached the porch before the cloud reached us. we climbed up the stairs, bursting through the front door, waking my friend's mother and grandmother. of course, she was upset that we were crying- we told her we had gotten frightened walking home, we went to the room we shared, pulled open the shade and the cloud was right outside the window. hysterical by this time, we pulled the shade down and stayed up all night. we vowed never to tell anyone in authority (like police, etc) because no one would believe it wasn't just two teenage girls who got scared walking home in the dark. to this day we remember it s clearly as the night it happened. we have lost touch over the years, but every once in a while we reconnect and remind each other about that night.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star that changed direction, then descended with a cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
On 07/30/2014 my wife, teenage grandson, and i were visiting at app.10:45 pm in toluca il. i was facing a window when i noticed the dark, bright red orb in the sky moving west to east. i brought it to their attention and the 3 of us got up and moved to the window and observed the object for a few seconds then went outside for a better look.  
i couldn’t tell how far away this thing was but it looked about the size of a full moon almost directly overhead.It wasn’t traveling at a high rate of speed but more like the speed of a small plane.
the color was a dark red like fire but no flames were visible. as it traveled east away from us it faded from dark red to orange then yellow to red again. i estimate that we viewed it for at least 20+ seconds.As it was nearing the end of our sight it curved from east to south then disappeared. we didn’t hear any sound or see any other activity in the sky. no pictures were taken.
content.summary: Dark red orb traveling west to east at rate of small plane. color changed red to orange to yellow

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the courtyard outside my apartment. i looked up at the half moon, saw a plane flying by and then noticed another object in the sky. i noticed the object was moving slower and was not a airplane or helicopter. i thought the object could have been another plane at first. the object cut across and down across the sky in a south-south east direction. it then stopped. i went in before it stopped and grabbed my camera. i realized the object was too far away for my camera to capture an image of it. then i really felt like it was looking at me. weird. i then thought to myself, if it doesn't want me to see it better than i don't want to see it. i thought this as i walked back into my apartment and put the camera down. i came back out and could not see it.I mainly wanted to report this just in case someone else saw it too. i did see another plane fly by where it had been a couple of minutes later and am almost sure it was a southwest airline plane. the plane seemed higher than usual though for this area since i am not far from lax.
content.summary: I looked up at the half moon & noticed  an airplane flying west to east. then i observed the object traveling down & over in the same direction the plane was heading. i then went to get my camera & realized my camera was useless in capturing image.

content.detailedDescription: I was working on my computer when my mother alerted me to noticing a star shaped red light glowing above her bedroom window that according to her moved abruptly in the sky. this was just a few minutes past midnight. in sheer excitement, i then went to have a look for myself and was able to spot this light but at another location to where my mother had seen it move to. this glowing object/orb remained within that area slowly moving to one side almost unnoticeably if not stared at constantly. it motioned this way for a few more minutes before it vanished from my line of sight. it was almost star like in appearance yet brighter than the surrounding stars. while having my gaze set on this object i decided to quickly look into the sky where my mother had said it previously was in case there anything else and i noticed another pale (off white) elliptically shaped orb dart across the sky horizontally a little faster that a jet plane. this pale orb wasn't very high in the sky and it was like a cloud in an elliptical shape slightly smaller than a light cessna aircraft. it was much lower than the glowing star shaped orb which appeared like a hovering craft resembling a drone. however, i would dispute the notion of it's drone like appearance due to its spectacular manoeuvre in changing locations in the sky as witnessed by my mother before sharing her account with me. viewing both these objects ran a fizzy rush of energy up my spine like a chill both in a starling and pleasant way. i lost the reddish-orange object/orb to my limited line of sight as there was a brick wall in the way to the side outside my mother's bedroom window. i was unable to take a picture with my phone as this glowing orb/object was far away to be captured in a picture on my phone. the night sky was clear and the stars clearly visible. the location of this object was in the south-westerly direction from where i live.
content.summary: Glowing orb like star shaped light hovered and moved in a localised region for about 20 minutes before it vanished

content.detailedDescription: Walking to the store down the road by construction area . changing of lights in the sky is what made it obvious. thought it was a airplane until the lights started changing but no sound coming from the object in the sky. also saw lights in a triangle shape. saw green pulsating lights. lights also became very bright at a point. after seeimg object it was scary but yet exciting. object moved in our direction and was afraid to look at it more.
content.summary: Lights changing in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Al salir de mi trabajo conduciendo el coche adverti una bruma que se pegaba al suelo, eso fue lo 1º que me llamó la atencion ya que no es normal en las islas canarias este fenómeno y a continuacion mire al cielo y en lo alto a una distancia considerable advertí los destellos entre las nubes y por el tamaño de las luces que destellaban muy distanciadas unas de otras y advirtiendo que era circular, el objeto (muy grande) destellaba de forma continua unasluces giratorias (me asombro el tamaño), estaba amaneciendo y la 
bruma(neblina que se pegaba al suelo), no tenía mucha visibilidad a ras del suelo y lo que tambien me llamó la atencion es que desde donde yo lo estaba viendo estaba casi en linea con la direccion donde se han visto salir luces que salen del mar y tambien de objetos estacionarios en el cielo ya que esta zona es supuestamente una zona de avistamientos por otras personas ya que hay una zona entre la isla de gran canaria y la de tenerife (isla vecina), se rumorea que es una zona de gran profundidad y por lo que me han contado da a una de las fosas mas profundas (desconozco como se llama esta fosa), yo no suelo hablar de estas cosas ni me gusta que me tomen por loco por lo que ahora despues de 38 años me atrevo a contarlo.No estuve demasiado tiempo observando este fenómeno pues estaba en una rotonda y no podia quedarme demasiado tiempo en el lugar, el objeto deaspareció entre las nubes tapando dicho abjeto,en el lugar quizas estaría unos 15-20 minutos hasta que lo perdi de vista, mis sentimientos quizas fue de asombro y estupefaccion ya que era la 1ª vez en mi vida que veia algo tan grande en el cielo de canarias, este objeto que decribo no se puede confundir con cualquier otra cosa, el tamaño y la distancia es lo que mas me llamo la atencion pues lo primero que pense es que debia ser tan grande como una isla pero todo esto desde el cielo.Sus movimientos eran circulares y de los bordes se veian las luces que giraban destellando.
content.summary: Por la distancia y a traves de las nubes solo se distinguia luces destellantes.

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the window to smoke and observe a light in the sky; i was facing east.

first i thought it was the moon because it was a clear night and the light was a circle on the sky.

i open the window, light a cigarette and take a smoke. when i wanted to get the smoke out i put my head oustide the window an realize that the moon was on my right side; on south side. it was fullmoon that night.

i looked again in front of me, and the other light was still there on the same position, not moving.

i observe this phenomenon for about a few minutes, aproximately 5 minutes. the light was just there, very intense because it seems to be very far away, probably more than 5 miles. it was discribing a perfect circle on the nigth sky, not moving, on the top of the mountains.

i sweetch looking at the strange light and the moon a few times, just to be sure of what i was looking.

then, in a blinking of an eye, it just desapear.
content.summary: Second moon in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Big blue sphere... diffrent shades of electric blue. no noise at all. no vibrations. hovered from behind me, over me, stood still over me for like 5 secs or so....And hovered past me. (i was aprox 7 months pregnant at time). i was sitting outside on rocking chair,  talking on phone. i looked up because the words look up came to my mind, interrupting my conversation. there it was...This big blue ball, a sphere hovering over and past me. i didnt know what it was...Except a big blue floating silent ball in the sky. i felt this sence of "its ok" after thinking oh my god.... what is that????!!!!!. the object just kept right on floating past me.
content.summary: Was on the phone, object hovered from behind me , over me and past me. noiselessly 100%.

content.detailedDescription:
We have a game camera that we put up to observe the deer across the street from our house.  my husband brought the disk in on sunday which contained approximately 120 pictures over a 4 day period.  on july 31 at 11:00pm beginning picture number 34, we had three pictures of 6 bright lights, all the same size and in a perfectly straight line, in the air.  the lights stayed exactly the same except changed in height.  the camera is motion activated and is set to take 3 consecutive shots and then go into a 5 minute timeout.  in the next shot after the timeout the lights were no longer visible.  we have had this camera up over the last 3 years and have never gotten anything even close to this.  there was a deer in the shot which seemed to be running off.   the camera faces an old driving range, so there are no roads or buildings that would be in the picture.

not sure what they are, but thought maybe you could help shed some light (no pun intended) on the situation.

thank you!
content.summary: Caught six lights on game camera.

content.detailedDescription:
This report is forcing me to give information that i do not have in order to submit, i do not know a shape or any details not the date or time.


back in the 1990's i don't remember the year or month or day i received a strange call from my daughter in chico ca. she said, "did you see the ufo?" i said, "what ufo?" she said, "it was huge, it blocked the whole sun, we all went outside (this included a total of 6 people) we all saw it!"

now my daughter has no interest in ufo's and no belief nor interest in any unusual phenomena so this was a very strange call, but stranger still is that i who am very interested, do not remember asking any further questions at all. i remember expecting it to be in the chico news paper and it not showing up, but then i forgot...Clearly a strange thing to forget for many years. i was living approx 30 mins away in the oroville ca area.

then one day suddenly it just came into my head, so i called my daughter and reminded her of the call she had made to me and what she had said. she responded that she "kind of remember something about a ufo."

 some weeks later she called me and said she had asked the others who had been there one at a time if they remembered, and she said "it was so strange, they each got a far away look on their faces and said "i kind of remember something about a ufo", just like her response to me.

i recently found this report by someone else and it made me decide that i should report this also as the thing was also very very large.



"very big disk in a canyon

chico ca, us

date of event 2009-06-15

was seen from hiway 32 east of chico about 20 to 25 miles...Saw brights lights truned around and pulled over and walked up a small hill..And could see a disk shaped thing that was flat on top with a dome on the bottom..The top had lights that were as big as a small house all around the outter edge all pointing up..It looked to have something like a run way in the middle of it..You could see what looked like heat waves coming up from it...It was big enough to park 30 to 50...18 wheelers from end to end...Was looking right down on top of it..It was in a canon and coved from one side to the other...Watched it for 20 mins. or so...Was no more than a 100 yards from it...No noise...We left after watching it...After we got home we couldnt reminber why we left...No cars came up or down the down the road while we were there...I am vetinam vet...Never seen anything like that on this earth...Have never told anybody but friends...People thing your nuts telling them stuff like that..."
content.summary: Extremely large ufo blocking the out the whole sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Beginning on july 4, 2014, we began to observe strange lights in the skies over my home. these lights had no recognizable "beacon" lights only a solid, white, light sometimes flashing bright.
sometimes, these lights are low-flying and other times they are very high in the sky. 
last night, (august 3, 2014), we observed one of these lights following a small airplane over our home. we live near a small airport and planes are in and out all hours of the day and night. this is when i realized that something wasn't right.
we plan to continue to watch these lights and hopefully get a high powered camera to get some photos and/or video.
content.summary: There are many lights flying in the night skies sometimes following airplaines

content.detailedDescription: It was friday aug. 1, 2014 at 9:15p.M. i was taking a letter to the mail box for saturday pick-up. as i turned to go back up the driveway i noticed 2 red lights approaching from the southeast. i thought they were helicopters, but they made no sound. i watched them pass over towards the northwest and then vanish.I thought to myself how lucky i was to be outside at just the right time. at that moment i notice 3 more red lights in the distance, approaching from the same direction as the first two. the 3 crossed the sky above me and vanished at about the place that the first 2 did. the objects never changed course or speed. i could not see any structure to the objects. in fact it was as though i could almost see thru the red lights. i then telephoned some friends in the area, but they were all inside their homes during the event. once i realized the objects were not helicopters, i tried to remain calm and observe and remember everything i saw. i hope this short report is of some value to mufon.
content.summary: 2 red lights appeared travelled side by side. then 3 more appeared and passed by.
